'''Poisonous potato slices''' are a joke [[food]] item obtained by cutting a poisonous potato at a [[poisonous potato cutter]] in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
Recipe is exclusive to the [[poisonous potato cutter]].
{{Stonecutting
|Poisonous Potato
|Poisonous Potato Slices
}}

== Usage ==
=== Food ===
To eat poisonous potato slices, press and hold {{control|use}} while it is selected in the hotbar. Eating them restores {{hunger|1}} [[hunger]] and 1.2 [[saturation]]. Unlike unprocessed poisonous potato, slices do not cause [[Poison]].

=== Smelting ===
{{Smelting

}}
